oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DESIGN OF AZA-POLYQUINANES VIA FISCHER INDOLE CYCLIZATION UNDER GREEN CONDITIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
CHINNAM, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: LINEAR TRIQUINANES
DIASTEREOSELECTIVE SYNTHESIS
ORGANIC-SYNTHESIS
FRAGMENTATION
CYCLOADDITION
SYSTEMS
UTILITY
ACCESS
Fischer Indole Synthesis
Polyquinane
Low Melting Mixture
Caged Compound
Diels-Alder Reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have demonstrated a simple and an efficient synthetic route for the synthesis of aza-polyquinane derivatives involving Fischer indole cyclization as a key step under low melting mixture conditions.
